channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Al and Patti Mansfield join to share how they met and subsequently embarked together on their vocation of Christ-centered marriage and spirit-filled ministry. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Freedom And Authority
channel.desc: Fr. Dubay describes the qualities of a good leader, how he governs people fairly and honestly with respect for the ultimate Ruler, God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fathers For Good
channel.desc: Fr. Francis Gustilo and Frank Padilla discuss the importance of the sacraments. The graces that are given through the sacraments help men stay faithful to their families and to Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford explains that we each have a sense of moral failure. St. Augustine is quoted with the beloved verse of, "You have made us for Yourself, Oh Lord and our hearts are ever restless, Lord, until they rest in Thee.". (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Ryan Penny, Brian Patrick Edwards, Steve Simeone, and Keith Downey contemplate laughter, how it deeply affects the soul, and how it can offer refreshment all over the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Five Priests
channel.desc: When an epidemic of Yellow Fever swept through Shreveport in 1873, five Catholic priests bravely ministered to the sick and dying before they succumbed to the disease themselves. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children's Rosary
channel.desc: Children gather to pray and learn more about the five Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary: Christ?s Baptism, the Wedding Feast at Cana, the Proclamation of the Kingdom, the Transfiguration, and the Institution of the Eucharist. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, explains how the Holy Spirit helps souls identify sins, not for the sake of condemnation, but conversion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Jason Shanks, the President of the National Eucharistic Congress, discuss the centrality of the Eucharist and the 2025 National Eucharistic Pilgrimage in Los Angeles. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: A look at how the Catechism defines and applies moral law to its teachings. Hosted by Fr. Charles Connor. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Edward Poppe Servant of God and how he offered himself as a sacrifice for priests. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Ronald K. Tacelli and Peter Kreeft discuss the role doubt has in faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Married couples that have met the challenge of staying in love share how they overcame selfishness and poor communication, both of which can destroy a marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch and Jason Shanks, the President of the National Eucharistic Congress, discuss the centrality of the Eucharist and the 2025 National Eucharistic Pilgrimage in Los Angeles. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Six Paths To The Priesthood
channel.desc: Learn about the different ways Jesus Christ drew each man to the priesthood in this deeply personal account of six Dominican friars ordained by Bishop Robert Barron, who reflects upon his own experiences as well. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Jason Simon returns to discuss his book, Mission Ready Friendship, with Fr. Mark. He emphasizes how successful evangelization stems from within authentic friendship. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Syria, In The Middle Of Ashes
channel.desc: The battle for Aleppo was one of the deadliest in the war in Syria. Aleppo is a microcosm of the war that devastated the country. Out of a population of 18 million people, more than 13 million are in need of humanitarian assistance. Children are most at risk and in distress, suffering from disease and malnutrition, forced to work, marrying early, subjected to abuse and forced to become child soldiers. In the midst of this humanitarian crisis, Christians are suffering twice: from the general instability caused by the war and from targeted attacks on Christian communities by jihadist militants determined to eradicate the Christian presence. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris clarifies that martyrs aren?t necessarily braver than most but have received a special grace from God. Gene Zannetti shares how sports can lead to evangelization. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints The Martyrs Of La Florida
channel.desc: The extraordinary faith of the Spanish priests and Apalachee natives that were killed while evangelizing and defending their Catholic faith in La Florida. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about Christ as the sign of contradiction that causes division among households, Catholic bible studies, and Mary as the Mother of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: Missionaries from FOCUS (Fellowship of Catholic University Students) at Mount St. Mary's University discuss living as role models, while relying on Christ as the ultimate role model. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her wisdom into Mary's trust and Corpus Christi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Shenan Boquet is back to look at the attack of the human person in today?s culture and the challenges and unexpected possible solutions the pro-life movement faces today. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: Every week, Abigail Galv?n and a team of pro-life experts shine the light of truth on abortion, euthanasia, assisted suicide, and the culture of death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Walking Through Time: Catholic London
channel.desc: Joanna presents an introduction to London's history with a walk across Tower Bridge and a look at the Tower of London, as she retells stories of heroic English martyrs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert Verdi?s Requiem
channel.desc: Experience Giuseppe Verdi?s powerful and iconic Requiem in D Minor in a performance at Milan?s Church of San Marco. Teodor Currentzis conducts this historic concert at the same place it premiered in 1868. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Our Lady of Prompt Succor has inspired Catholics during the darkest periods in New Orleans history, including a disastrous fire and a British attack during the War of 1812. ?Miracle Hunter? Michael O?Neill investigates. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Six Paths To The Priesthood
channel.desc: Learn about the different ways Jesus Christ drew each man to the priesthood in this deeply personal account of six Dominican friars ordained by Bishop Robert Barron, who reflects upon his own experiences as well. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA

channel.desc: Christine, Eva, Joseph and Enrique follow the 14 Stations of the Passion and Death of Our Lord Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Holy Mass with the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate the Solemnity of the Sacred Heart from Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, Alabama. (75 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses that if your mind finds fruit in any point of your prayer, you should remain with that point and not go further. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Witness the Eucharistic devotion and spirituality of the Franciscan Order in this EWTN original docudrama on St. Francis of Assisi, St. Clare, St. Paschal Baylon and St. Padre Pio. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Philip Bochanski discusses his call to the priesthood, his most interesting assignments and his work at Courage International, an apostolate that provides pastoral care to men and women with same-sex attraction. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: In the beautiful, diverse country of Tanzania, Muslim radicalization is a present threat. Join Jonas Soto as he interviews Mons. Wolfgang Pisa, OFM, of the Tanzanian Lindi diocese. (30 minutes).

channel.title: new! Rosary Relay From The Grotto At Lourdes
channel.desc: From one of the greatest miracle sites in Lourdes, France, pray the rosary in communion with Catholics around the world for the annual Global Rosary Relay. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: Find out why the Blessed Mother appeared to a simple man of faith - Juan Diego - and asked him to carry her message, a message that would unite diverse peoples and change the course of history. Animated. (40 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Unsolvable Problem
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Andy and her lovable convent of sisters encounter a dilemma as they plan a patriotic picnic for the poor. The kids learn about convent life, prayers to Jesus and how to handle life?s problems, big and small. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother talks about the power of the Eucharist and the great devotion we should show Him in our daily lives. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Called
channel.desc: A priest?s visit to a family home is the setting for this powerful dramatization of the priesthood?s power to communicate God?s grace. See how he helps them resolve the issues that they?re facing and find joy in Christ. Subtitled. (75 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: No Greater Love
channel.desc: After finding out he was nearly aborted, Deacon Julio reflects on how this and other events in his life have shaped his calling to the priesthood. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Kansas Royals? Mike Sweeney shares how he?s batted for multiple major league teams in his career, and why he feels safe at ?home? in his Catholic faith. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Chris Stefanick travels to Steamboat, Colorado, to meet Jim Boyne, the director of a program to train future Olympic athletes, and tackle the slopes with Catholic Olympians-in-training. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sister Lucia Our Lady's Messenger
channel.desc: The life of the longest living Fatima visionary, Sister Lucia de Jes?s dos Santos, and her fervent mission to spread devotion to Our Lady?s Immaculate Heart. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford treats the understanding of how faith impacts life and how it is different from experience. Walking with Our Lord by using the Scriptures enhances our faith in God. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sainte Brigitte De Su?de ? 2eme Partie: Vers Rome
channel.desc: Ce docudrame original d'EWTN pr?sente la vie et les r?v?lations mystiques de sainte Brigitte de Su?de, la grande sainte du XIVe si?cle. Ce deuxi?me ?pisode pr?sente ses r?v?lations mystiques alors qu?elle ?tablissait un nouvel ordre religieux, men? une vie de pri?re constante et plaidait pour une r?forme eccl?siale. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: As a former lapsed Catholic, Maria Hirsch shares her rediscovery of her Catholic Faith that lead her back to her Catholic roots began while serving as Director of a ballet school. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica uses her wit and wisdom as she examines the story of St. Paul and the folded tent. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: St. Paul The Apostle Burning For Christ
channel.desc: An EWTN original documentary presents the life, missionary journeys and legacy of the apostle St. Paul, who was driven by a zealous love of Christ to proclaim the Gospel worldwide. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews H.E Yousaf Sohan, Bishop of the Multan diocese in Pakistan to learn about the 2023 blasphemy accusations and violent mob attacks in Jaranwala, Pakistan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Gabriel shares her faith journey of falling in love with Jesus and a vocation with the Sisters of Life where she works to protect and enhance the sacredness of human life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother Angelica has a saying when people are afraid to listen to God. She calls it the "Old Testament trust." In other words, something that people are reluctant to give up or some form of discomfort. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: To attain heaven, we must become holy as Christ is holy, for it is only in this state that we can stand before God. Susan Conroy explains there are many ways to attain holiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: When mom and dad disagree on how to discipline the kids, accepting it is not the answer. Dr. Ray does some role play on common, everyday situations to impart solid advice for life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: As they continue their debate, Author of Humanae Vitae Blessed Pope Paul VI discovers what fuels Margaret Sanger?s hatred of Church teachings and why she truly founded Planned Parenthood. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo is joined by Jim and Joy Pinto. Together they prepare a wonderful dinner for two as they provide advice on how to keep the romance alive even after many years of marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Fr. Nick Monco describes the ways in which to defeat despair and how shame can also either draw us closer to conversion or prevent us from obtaining it. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Brian Weber lost his only son in a car crash before getting deployed to Afghanistan. He shares how an encounter with Our Lady of Lourdes in the Grotto changed his life and brought light into the darkness of suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen explains how to make humanity more loveable and points to three stages of love. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers caller questions about biblical history as literal or figurative, the presence of apostles at the Last Supper, and a marriage convalidation works in the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Solemnity Of The Feast Of Sts. Peter And Paul
channel.desc: From St. Peter?s Basilica (Altar of the Chair), and presided over by the Holy Father on the Solemnity of Saints Peter and Paul. Holy Mass and blessing of the Pallia for the new Metropolitan Archbishops. (105 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Center At Nyu: An Icon Of The New Evangelization
channel.desc: A documentary on the Dominican-run center at New York University, which provides the spiritual and intellectual formation of 18,000 Catholic students. (15 minutes).

channel.title: Six Paths To The Priesthood
channel.desc: Learn about the different ways Jesus Christ drew each man to the priesthood in this deeply personal account of six Dominican friars ordained by Bishop Robert Barron, who reflects upon his own experiences as well. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).
